name: UFO Storm -Corn Raid Lite
description:
Text is better visible on full screen just hit escape to exit.

Lite version is just the first map.  The full version can be bought and downloaded at: 

https://gamingchef.itch.io/ufo-storm

Choose your path and raid the galaxy for crops.  Deploy your UFOs to steal crops and avoid the barrage of missiles that impede your assault.  Return your plunder to your own space farm where you can harvest your crops and protect your crops from bugs with missiles.    Just be watchful for counterattacks on your base!

4 Game Modes:

  • Storm
  • Harvest
  • Defense
  • Explorer (unlocked with more crops)

4 Game Maps with varied challenges that include:

  • Timed
  • Moving Crops
  • Asteroids
